DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether surgical outcome patient undergo Descemet 's Stripping Endothelial Keratoplasty ( DSEK ) improve use insertion device traditional forceps insertion method .
DOC.detailed_description: Laboratory study clinical functionality test show study device safely forms tissue without crease folding . It allow allograft tissue safely pass anterior chamber without compression , crush , squeeze endothelial cell . The device provide continuous irrigation eye prevent collapse anterior chamber insertion . Our study focus safety efficacy novel instrument current method insertion ( forceps ) . FDA classified device Class I , Reserved .
DOC.criteria: Patients Fuchs endothelial dystrophy bullous keratopathy determine need corneal transplant visual restoration .
